title: Cash for Gold
lyrics:
I dunno I can’t remember your name
Well I’m sorry everyone looks the same
I have a problem and it’s breaking my heart
You gotta help me I don’t know where to start
I try to speak I can’t say nothing

I had a dream it was really something

But now I’m up, I can’t recall what it was



Well, have you been around here for a while?

Who'd you have to rob to get that style?

Don’t get angry, don’t act so surprised

Your fate is showing, I can see it in your eyes



So tell me what I’ve got to do to

To let me t-t-touch you

You say you’re lost but I don’t believe that’s true, no



You’re at home, baby

Cash for gold, baby

You got that diamond handed soul, baby

On me, no control



Oh my my, my love

I know you’re wise to all those trials and games

They'll crack fools of slobber and they drool and try to convince you it’s rain



Well you know some people got no class

There’s also one more to try to make a pass

I can’t dance, I just stand by the wall

Who am I say anything at all?



Well, but if I had it my way

I’d leave my body, fly away

Off to another world

Maybe someday I’ll try



And I’ll be at home, baby

Cash for gold, baby

Got those quicksilver holes, you can swallow me whole
